name: 洪子逸
objective: 本課程包含：計算機硬體結構、計算機作業系統、計算機軟體系統、程式語言、基本程式設計與應用、資料處理、檔案管理、資料庫管理系統、應用套裝軟體、資料通訊與網路等。
schedule:
1 Course Introduction
2 The Networked Economy:A New Way of doing Business
3 Information Technology:The Infrastructure of The Networked Economy
4 Sharing Information and Resources Through Networks
5 Handling The Present with Transaction Processing Systems
6 Remembering The Past with Organizational Memory
7 Preparing for The Future with Decision Support Systems
8 Preparing for The Future with Electronic Commerce
9 Midterm Exam/Proposal
10 Developing Information Systems 1
11 Developing Information Systems 2
12 Crime and Security in The Networked Economy
13 Privacy and Ethical Issues in The Networked Economy
14 Societal Issues in The Networked Economy
15 IT Issue/Case I
16 IT Issue/Case II
17 IT Issue/Case III
18 Final Exam/Project
scorePolicy:
35%: In-class Performance
30%: Midterm Exam/Proposal
35%: Final Exam/Project
